author: Kashmira Gander
title: Pregnant Women With COVID-19 Passing Coronavirus on to Babies 'Cannot Be Ruled Out,' Scientists Say
description: But the study should be "very reassuring for mothers" as none of the babies were severely ill, one professor told Newsweek.
content:
The potential for mothers to pass the new coronavirus, which causes COVID-19, on to their babies "cannot be ruled," according to the authors of a study.
The paper published in the journal JAMA Pediatrics involved 33 pregnant women diagnosed with COVID-19, an… [+5594 chars]
